img_text: WHITE MEN TANGO ERRORISTS Tango.Church Fuck Snowflakes, Lefties, SJW When I was in Germany, the stronghold of lefties group. She know what is the true characteristic of Islam, but i can feel her frustration because there is nothing she can do other than protesting in front of the Pegida booth and hope that "education can fix this situation.
